review: I really like the Fire Stick.  We have 2 Chromecasts and 2 Fire Sticks.  What I like about the Fire Stick is the remote.  I only give it a 3 because we purchased the Sling TV to view live tv and have had many issues with it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am currently working in Trinidad & bought this to take with me. It was easy to set up & works wonderfully - I would certainly recommend it especially for thhe price
author: Lynne Ross-Palmer

review: Is really spectacular, I love it

review: Totally enjoy the Fire TV Stick!!!

review: Love it added flickster netflicks  tunein pandora and amazon movies prime free this is great  bought 2 for my home

review: Am loving this thing! Been watching interesting documentaries and good old movies for free. Thrilled....
